tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE costume_inventory (
    costume_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    costume_name VARCHAR(255),
    size VARCHAR(50),
    color VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    last_alteration_date DATE,
    ordered_by VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE DanceCostumeInventory (
  costume_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  costume_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  size VARCHAR(10),
  color VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Alterations (
  alteration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  costume_id INT NOT NULL,
  alteration_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_costume_id FOREIGN KEY (costume_id) REFERENCES DanceCostumeInventory(costume_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  order_date DATE NOT NULL,
  delivery_date DATE,
  total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE dance_costumes (
	costume_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	costume_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	size VARCHAR(50),
	color VARCHAR(50),
	quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE alterations (
	alteration_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	costume_id INT REFERENCES dance_costumes(costume_id),
	alteration_type VARCHAR(50),
	date_requested DATE,
	date_completed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
	order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	costume_id INT REFERENCES dance_costumes(costume_id),
	customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	order_date DATE,
	delivery_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DanceCostumes (
  costume_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  costume_name VARCHAR(255),
  costume_type VARCHAR(100),
  costume_size VARCHAR(50),
  costume_color VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Alterations (
  alteration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  costume_id INT,
  alteration_date DATE,
  alteration_description TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_costume_id FOREIGN KEY (costume_id) REFERENCES DanceCostumes(costume_id)
);

CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
  order_item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  order_id INT,
  costume_id INT,
  item_quantity INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_order_id FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES Orders(order_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_costume_id FOREIGN KEY (costume_id) REFERENCES DanceCostumes(costume_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Inventory (
  inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  costume_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_costume_id FOREIGN KEY (costume_id) REFERENCES DanceCostumes(costume_id)
);
